name: Under Dogs
description:
Play as Nala and Maia as they traverse the forest, freeing animals, solving puzzles, fighting machines and saving their Hoomans in this fun homage to old-school gaming with UnderDogs.

A 3D couch co-op, adventure platformer set in a forest where the evil Machine Army has taken animals hostage and started destroying nature. Save the day in this Split Screen adventure where you play as dogs Nala and Maia who set out to save the day and find their Hoomans.

Please fill out our survey when you have played and let us know how we did.
https://forms.gle/epnMCXpgMxtJPY917

https://www.instagram.com/UnderDogsGame/ https://twitter.com/UnderDogsGame https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLHJodu0coBlukgcSIl2KGA https://www.tiktok.com/@underdogsgame

Made by students for their final projects.
